for (int i = 0; i < nameArray.size(); i++) { maxYList.add(mLineData.getDataSetByIndex(i).getYMax()); } if (null == mContext || "null".equals(mContext)) { } else { LayoutInflater layoutInflater = LayoutInflater.from(mContext.getApplicationContext()); final int count = lineY.size(); mView.removeAllViews(); for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) { View view = layoutInflater.inflate(R.layout.item_chart_ex, null, false); final LinearLayout ly = (LinearLayout) view.findViewById(R.id.picEx); final TextView txt = (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.picName); txt.setTextColor(mContext.getResources().getColor(colorResource)); if (i > colorArray.size()) { ly.setBackgroundColor(Color.parseColor(colorArray.get(i / colorArray.size())));
